title: Looking for a group of good players looking to climb
body: I've given up on teaming with random players who go 0/6 and blame other teammates for losing. Looking for a group of people who can hold their lane well and secure objectives both quickly and efficiently.

replies.body: Help a friend out! Add me if you need mid and jg :).
add me if you need bot lane player
Add me for mid and jg
Add me!! I jungle top and support.
I would but you're from NA mate not OCE so I can't add you unfortunately....

Hey, i would like to join your group. I never rage (unless rage at opponent) and i forgive all mistakes just not too much :P. I'm objective player so i focus more on taking objectives rather than piling up kill count. I'm pretty decent shotcaller and usually use ping system to do that.

Currently i'm doing my placement (5W - 3L) but i should be around in silver 4 or 5. I main support (name the champs i make it support) and control/tanky jungle/top. Usually i don't get my main role so its kind of frustrating and i got my pref role in a team. 

I'm free in the afternoon and sometimes at night
Nice! Add me in game and we can talk further!
Ayyo, I'm a little blebbo that wants to play games without AFK hoes.

Are you looking to make a team? If so I'd love to join! I have a pretty positive attitude 99% of the time(the 1% time is when I'm feeling really really hungry:3) and won't blame others for my own mistakes. :) I also understand the importance of objectives(not everything, but I love to learn!:P). 

I recently hit 30 and I don't feel like I'm totally ready for ranked solo yet(I'm only COMFORTABLE with mid and janna support so far) but I'd love to join a team(since in teams you don't get random roles)! 

Here's my op.gg profile if you want more info: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=iDeadly

If you've never played ranked before you should go try it out as there is a lot more to it then normals. If you have at least 3-4 champions in your champion pool who you can play well and win the lane most of the time you should be fine. Nevertheless, add me in game and we can talk about it more.

I know those feels friend.
hmu ;)

Whats your rank but id be willing to help C:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
My highest was silver but I've fallen down to the low ranks of bronze 4
